title: Review Driving Score for Insurance Discount
description: A customer is enrolled in a usage-based insurance program and wants to review their driving score and get tips for improving it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's driving data for the last 30 days, including events like hard braking, rapid acceleration, and speeding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the driving behavior report.

tasks.description: Explain the customer's current score and highlight the specific behaviors that are negatively impacting it (e.g., frequent hard braking).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the reasons for the score.

tasks.description: Provide coaching tips for improving the score, such as maintaining a greater following distance to avoid hard braking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides actionable advice to help the customer improve their score and earn a larger discount.
